intervals.description: Replace engine oil and oil filter. Use BMW Advantec Ultimate 5W-40 or equivalent.
Check and adjust intake and exhaust valve clearances on both cylinders. ShiftCam engines require specific procedure.
Drain and replace engine coolant. Use BMW-approved coolant/antifreeze.
Replace spark plugs on both cylinders. Use BMW OEM or NGK LMAR8BI-9 iridium plugs.
Replace air filter element. Inspect more frequently when riding in dusty/off-road conditions.
Replace shaft drive final drive gear oil. Use BMW Hypoid gear oil SAE 90.
Replace front and rear brake fluid (including ABS system). Use DOT 4 brake fluid.
Check front and rear brake pad thickness. Replace when wear indicator is reached.
Inspect Telelever front and Paralever rear suspension bearings and joints for play or wear.
Check battery voltage and charging system. BMW uses CAN-bus battery management.
